tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EmployeeAvailability (
  employee_id INT,
  day_of_week VARCHAR(10),
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME,
  PRIMARY KEY (employee_id, day_of_week)
)
CREATE TABLE employee_availability ( employee_id INT, day_of_week VARCHAR(20), start_time TIME, end_time TIME );
CREATE TABLE schedule_preferences ( employee_id INT, preferred_day VARCHAR(20), preferred_shift VARCHAR(20) );

CREATE TABLE EmployeeDetails (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    position VARCHAR(50),
    hire_date DATE
);
